title: LeagueBaseRun - Gamemode
body:
> |LeagueBaseRun|

* This is a game is in Crystal Scar which involves Running Or Killing

> PermaBans

* {{champion:421}} 
* {{champion:28}} 
* {{champion:29}} 
* {{champion:35}} 

> cxxx{}::::Rules:::::>
 
* Only Buy boots & Items that gives Movespeed
* Team 1 = Fielders
* Team 2 = Runners
 
>Runners

* You start in 2min
*  Run to Center ----> Drill Turret ----> Center ----> Next Turret in Anti - Clockwise ----> Repeat till you get to the last turret ----> Center ----> Home base ----> get a point
* Next person runs every time a teammate makes it to Drill Turret
* Shout 'Safe' everytime you make it to a turret
* Get 5 points = Win
* Try not to die
* Your safe when your in the TurretZone

>Fielders

* Kill the Runners
* You can't touch the Runners if there in the TurretZone

> What not to do

* No b
* No Pots
* No Trolling
 
> If you got ideas pls comment below
